column1: Local Foods////One of the places I love to eat at
column2: because the food here is fresh
column3: health and so tasty!  It's hard to say what my favorite meal is as everything I've eaten leaves me with satisfaction. I find on a cooler day the soups are unique one that I simply love has coriander in it and is a must.  Also the selection of salads have interesting dressings that can be had on or on the side.  Casual
